title: Giro Montaro & Synthe get MIPS 2 redesign, plus new Blaze winter boots, Xnetic rain wear & more!
content:
At the high-end, Giro has new drool-worthy helmets for both road and MTB. But what about the old favorites? Instead of just fading away, Giro has updated the beloved Montaro and Synthe with new MIPS 2 designs that should make them very appealing based on features and price.
